author: trawick
msg: use ac_cv_prog_gcc instead of GCC in APR_TRY_COMPILE_NO_WARNING
ac_cv_prog_gcc is set when appropriate in apr-util's configure,
so the check for the type of the inbuf parm to iconv works again

author: bnicholes
msg: Divided the cstat() memory pool into per processor memory pools to avoid having
two different processors return the same memory node on an apr_palloc().

author: kfogel
msg: (store_desc): Make the backslash quote a newline, not a space.
